name: PCKG_BUDGET_INQUIRY
body_snippet:
package PCKG_BUDGET_INQUIRY is

  -- Author  : AZHAR HUSSAIN
  -- Created : 9/28/2005 2:23:51 PM
PROCEDURE PRO_POP_TEMP_ESTIMATE_BDGT(PARM_BOOK_ID NUMBER,PARM_FOR_MONTH DATE , PARM_ITEM_FORM VARCHAR2,PARM_ITEM_TO VARCHAR2);
--Functional Overview 
 /*
  Get Record From 
        1. MNO_INV_BUDGET_FG_DET MIBFD [ MIBFD.NO_OF_BAGS*100](at given date) to get ESTIMATED QTY
        2. PRODUCTION_DETAIL[ SUM(PD.QTY_PRODUCED)] to get actual production for this ACT_THIS_MONTH
        3. MNO_INV_BUDGET_FG_DET[MIBFD.RATE_PER_LBS] to get estimated rate for this month
        4. Invoice_Detail [SUM(id.amount+id.stax_amount) / SUM(id.primary_qty) ] to get actual rate for this month
  and populate temporary table TEMP_ESTIMATE_BDGT  */
PROCEDURE PRO_POP_GOUP_SALES (PARM_BOOK_ID NUMBER,PARM_FOR_MONTH DATE /*, PARM_ITEM_FORM VARCHAR2,PARM_ITEM_TO VARCHAR2*/);
--Functional Overview
/*  
 Get Record From
     1. MNO_BDGT_GRP_CONFIG_ACC_RANGES[ACCNT_RANGE_ID ,BDGT_GRP_CONFIG_ID,ACC_CODE_FROM,ACC_CODE_TO] to get all accopunt ranges
        populate code_combination criteria and get sum actual_balanace(From pckg_account_inquiry.get_balance) from this code combinmation criteria
     2. MNO_EXPNS_BUDGT_ENTRY_DET DT [SUM(DT.BDGT_AMNT_IN_THOUSANDS)] to get budget balance 
  populate temp table TEMP_BDG_GROUP_BAL "Group wise estimated Balnace Amount" and "Group wise actual Balnace Amount"
  */ 

end PCKG_BUDGET_INQUIRY;
